title: Self-Organized Mathematics Learning Process Utilizing Social Software

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizing real-time/asynchronous interactions via online collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can systematically document and share math problem-solving processes using wikis
Learners can improve math modeling assignments by incorporating peer feedback in discussion forums
Learners can reflectively report self-organized learning experiences (success/failure cases) through blogging
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
